resources.string: You must have a social sharing account linked to this phone that can share this type of file.\n\nLink to one of your existing accounts on %1$s to share this file.
None of the configured social networks support setting the profile picture.
Touch to view and edit tags
This upload will be queued for transfer when WiFi becomes available. To upload immediately, go to settings to disable data saver.
Uploading over the network may take longer than using a WiFi network.
%1$s will be queued for upload when Wi-Fi becomes available or when data saver is disabled. Check progress in the notification window.
%1$s will be queued for upload when Wi-Fi becomes available. Check progress in the notification window.
%1$s will be uploaded. Check progress in the notification window.
%1$s will be uploaded when previous files have completed uploading. Check progress in the notification window.
Some of the files failed to upload to one or more of the selected social networks. Please retry the upload of these items or cancel to remove them from the queue
The upload \'%1$s\' failed to upload. You may retry the upload or cancel to remove it from the queue.
The upload of %1$s to the following networks because the social network is not available: %2$s. Would you like to retry uploading to the networks that were unavailable?
The upload could not be completed
%1$s is an invalid file. Would you like to delete this file?
One or more of the selected items is not supported by the following social networks: %1$s.
%1$s is an invalid file and cannot be uploaded.
The upload of %1$s could not be completed because the maximum amount of data has already been uploaded to the following social networks: %2$s.
The upload of %1$s could not be completed because %2$s is not available on %3$s
The upload of %1$s could not be completed because %2$s on %3$s is full.
The upload of %1$s could not be completed because the maximum number of albums have already been added to the following social networks: %2$s.
One or more of the selected items have been previously uploaded. Continuing will upload the duplicate items again.
The upload of content is not allowed while airplane mode is enabled. Would you like to disable airplane mode and try again?
The upload \'%1$s\' failed to upload because one or more of the files cannot be found. Please make sure the SD card is inserted properly and try again.
Title not editable on social network
The editing of the title for \'%1$s\' could not be completed on %2$s because editing of the title is not supported.
Caption not editable on social network
The editing of the caption for \'%1$s\' could not be completed on %2$s because editing of the caption is not supported.
The selected videos are too large to be uploaded to any of the selected social networks.

One or more of the selected videos are too large to be uploaded to one or more of the selected social networks. Continuing will upload the videos to the social networks that support larger file sizes. Refer to the notification window for more details.
No installed application to handle request.
The photo was not found. Please choose another and try again.
The media was deleted. Please try again.
%1$s will be queued for upload when Wi-Fi becomes available.
%1$s will be uploaded when previous files have completed uploading
Disable data saver or go to Wi-Fi settings to begin uploading.
The video \'%s\' is currently pending approval. You will not be able to access this video until YouTube has approved this video.
%d videos are currently pending approval. You will not be able to access these videos until YouTube has approved them.
Unknown error has occurred. Please try again.
Too many pictures are queued for uploading.
Server has given up uploading the picture.
Please choose a service for your upload
